To perform analysis on user specific data, the VCF/BCF file must be indexed by GQT tools. Below are the two steps to create GQT indexed files:

bcftools index your_file.vcf.gz
gqt/bin/gqt convert bcf -i your_file.vcf.gz

The indexing can be performed either on VCF or BCF file. Then provide GQT created indexed files as input to the webGQT by clicking Browse tab.

Required input files:
your_file.bcf
your_file.bcf.gqt
your_file.bcf.bim
your_file.bcf.vid
your_file.bcf.off
your_file.bcf.csi
